transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji. Good afternoon sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir maine dala tha morning mein hi. Theek hai? To mere paas reply aaya hai unka abhi thodi der pehle. Theek hai? Unhone pura check kar liya hai IndiaMART ke lead manager system ke through. Jo bhi aapka hai na. To wo IndiaMART ki taraf se usme koi bhi problem nahi aa rahi hai. Matlab uski
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Jitni bhi settings hai na, wo sari okay chal rahi hai. Unme koi issue nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: To unhone mere ko wahi bheja hai ki Avnish yahan se matlab as an IndiaMART ke system se koi bhi problem nahi aa raha hai aur jo restriction ho raha hai na sir ke number pe jo personal whatsapp pe wo meta ke through ho raha hai. Seedhe. Yahan se hamare.
Customer: [inaudible] chalenge. Thank you.
Executive: Okay. Actually kya hai wo ban ho chuka hai to mere ko karna hai uske upar thoda sa kaam. To abhi is topic ko jyada discuss karke matlab nahi time waste hoga. Main abhi kuch aur uske upar try karta hu. Thank you so much for your help.
Executive: To sir main kab aap se baat kar lu? Aap bata do kab aap free rahoge?
Customer: Apun sham ko baat karte hai fir 5 baje. Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai. No issue sir. Okay thank you so much.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Restriction on WhatsApp number.



Resolution:

- Executive informed issue is from Meta.



Next Steps: 

- Will connect at 5 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp, restriction, meta
